result.pre: the ‘princomp’ function in R ( R Core Team 2018).
result.post: scores on the first axis of the PCA (PC1)

result.pre: may be a plastic response to increased temperatures during development.
result.post: could also be evolving in response to changing selection

result.pre: G.J. ( 2010). Geographical Variation in Bill Size across Bird
